repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:latest 
MAINTAINER Christian LÃ¼ck <christian@lueck.tv> 

ADD https://github.com/carlwoodward/disco/archive/master.zip /master.zip 
RUN echo "Install" && \  
apt-get update && \
 apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y ruby unzip python && \
gem install sass && \
unzip /master.zip && \
mv /disco-master /code && \
rm /master.zip && \
cd /code && \
sass --update web/sass:web/css || true && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

EXPOSE 8080 
WORKDIR /code/web 
USER nobody 
CMD python -m SimpleHTTPServer 8080
